text: Jundallah (Soldiers of Allah) was a Islamist militant group related to the Tehrik-i-Taliban Pakistan (TTP). It was led by Hakimullah Mehsud, who was the leader of the TTP until he died on the 1st of November 2013. On the 17th of November 2014, a spokeman for the group said that they had joined Daesh, after a meeting with 3 people from the group. == References == Category:Islamist militant groups Category:Islamic State Category:Taliban
title: Jundallah (Pakistan)
